short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple, stylish, and responsive, Ownpage is an alternative to your navigator new tab page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Google Chrome extension for Ownpage

Alternative home page and new tab page for your browser.
You can easily customize it with your own links and colors.
You can also change the number of boxes as you wish.

Ownpage is an opensource app. View source on github.com
